alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 3:50AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN PORTAGE AND WAUPACA COUNTIES THROUGH 445 AM CDT... At 349 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Whiting, or 9 miles southeast of Stevens Point, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Stevens Point, Waupaca, New London, Clintonville, Whiting, Amherst, Chain O` Lakes-King, Hartman Creek State Park, Plover, and Stockton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
